title: Sophy’s rose
body: I have had this rose in my garden for 14 years and it has never disappointed. The colour is just amazing, being a very saturated vibrant deep fuschia pink. Buds open looking like it’s going to be a red rose but quickly changes to it’s true colour. If you like a pop of colour in your garden you can’t go far wrong. Very healthy with an upright habit. Bees have been known to sleep in the deep petals overnight.
